content: I think I'll try out Zotero and Citavi to see which one fits my needs better. I've already got a lot of papers to read and summarize, so I want to make sure I choose the right tool. By the way, do you have any tips on how to stay organized and focused while working on my thesis? I feel like I've been making good progress, but I want to make sure I stay on track and meet my deadlines.
